label: REMO2020 v2.2 iMOVE-LUC
label_extended: Regional Climate Model REMO, version 2.2, hydrostatic configuration with MACv2 aerosol forcing, Fresh-water Lake model (FLake) and interactive Vegetation (iMOVE) with land use change (LUC) from the LUCAS LUC dataset
